item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Scürvey Dög on Westminster St.  - Look for the non-descript black box at 1718 Westminster, next to Route 10 to find it. (please check the map)

So its Halloween, and where better to hold the the Monday Night Meetup than Scürvey Dög - home of the infamous New Vintage Alternative 80's & Classic Punk Party that that we frequented a few times in 2010! So whether you want to dress in black, go vintage punk, or just wear your Halloween costume for the first time or again, here's your chance! This place has received rave reviews from P-Collective members and also from others too! See here: http://www.yelp.com/b.... If you like the Avery and E&O, then this is for you, and hey, its Halloween! This place is always a good time, so, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Christopher is hosting this one - please look at his picture!!!!"
item.name: Halloween Monday Night Meetup - The Scürvey Dög!
